com.smartgwt.client.docs
Interface Images

public interface Images

Referring to and loading images.

The two main URL settings relevant to loading images are:
* imgDir (where application-specific images live)
* skinImgDir (where system supplied images live)

See Also:
Canvas.getImgURL(java.lang.String), Canvas.imgHTML(java.lang.String), Canvas.getImage(java.lang.String), Canvas.setImage(java.lang.String, java.lang.String), Page.setAppImgDir(), Page.getAppImgDir(), Page.setAppFilesDir(), Page.getAppFilesDir(), Page.setSkinDir(), Page.getSkinDir(), Page.getSkinImgDir(), Page.getImgURL(java.lang.String), Page.getURL(java.lang.String), Page.loadStyleSheet(java.lang.String), TabSet.getSkinImgDir(), Canvas.getAppImgDir(), Canvas.getSkinImgDir(), ListGrid.getSkinImgDir(), CubeGrid.getSkinImgDir(), Scrollbar.getSkinImgDir(), Scrollbar.getCornerSrc(), Scrollbar.getHSrc(), Scrollbar.getVSrc(), Canvas.getSkinImgDir(), ImgSplitbar.getSkinImgDir()
